Rainy_Day_0: It's raining outside so try to stay indoors, babe.#$e#Some people are quite prone to colds when you stay out in this type of weather.
Rainy_Day_1: It's raining! I can't wait to do nothing, but stay indoors all day.
Rainy_Day_2: Good morning!$h#$e#Have a great day, honey, and don't work yourself too hard!
Rainy_Day_3: As much as I love the rain, I can't really go out wearing heels like these...
Rainy_Day_4: I'm still not used to cooking food but I'll try my best for you, @!$1
Rainy_Night_0: Are you cold, darling? Come to bed so we can warm you up.$l
Rainy_Night_3: The rain makes our home seem so cozy.$h
Rainy_Night_4: I feel like staying in bed today, wanna keep me company?$1
Rainy_Night_5: I'm glad you're home... I feel like cuddling a lot tonight!$l
Indoor_Day_0: Good morning, handsome.^Good morning, gorgeous.$h#$e#Ready for a hard day's work?
Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, sunshine.$l#$b#I tried making something for you![210 211 195 240 610]
Indoor_Day_2: Did you sleep well?#$b#You looked like you were having a nice dream!$1
Indoor_Day_3: Well look at you. I must still be dreamin'$4
Indoor_Day_4: I look at all the hard work you've done on this farm, and I have to say I'm really impressed.#$e#I'm really proud of you, @.$4
Indoor_Night_0: Did you get everything done today, @?#$e#You must be tired.#$b#I'm ready for bed whenever you are.$l
Indoor_Night_1: You look like you did a lot of work today!$h#$e#There's no shame in taking a load off.
Indoor_Night_2: I'm glad you're home.#$e#I started feeling a little lonely.$l
Indoor_Night_3: Are you done with your work? Come, let's get you to bed so we can cuddle.
Indoor_Night_4: I'm done for the day and ready for a good night's sleep!
Outdoor_0: It's a beautiful day today, isn't it, sunshine?
Outdoor_1: If you need me, I'll just be around the farm today.#$e#I'll be cheering you on, haha!$1
Outdoor_2: Have a nice day today alright, sunshine?#$e#The weather is nice today, so try to do as much as you can.
Outdoor_4: This should keep you energized for the day!$h[204]
OneKid_1: I hope %kid1 grows to be a wonderful person like you!$l
OneKid_2: Don't worry, I'll keep an eye on %kid1 today. You just focus on your work!$h
OneKid_3: Life's different now that we have a child but I don't mean that in a bad way.
TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their breakfast. Go ahead and seize the day, darling!
TwoKids_1: I hope you finish work early. The kids have been talking nonstop about playtime with you!
TwoKids_2: I think your charming personality is growing on the kids, darling.#$e#Everytime I look at them I can't stop smiling.$1
TwoKids_3: I've said it many times before, but I love our family so much!$4
Good_0: The married life is... Well, I can't even begin to describe it!$h#$b#And not to mention it was with someone as wonderful as you.$l
Good_1: The day you told me that you loved me was the greatest day of my life.$4
Good_2: You know, because of you, I've stopped smoking.#$b#And I feel great!$1#$e#Instead of taking a drag from a cigarette, I'm starting to take walks in the forest.
Good_3: Well, hello there handsome!^Well, hello there gorgeous!#$e#Ready to face the day?
Good_4: Please be careful out there, @. I know you're super strong and all, but don't get too careless out there...$2
Good_5: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you do something different?$l^Your feminine allure is irresistible today. I can't keep my eyes off you.$l
Good_6: Don't mind me... I'm just enjoying the view, heh.$4
Good_7: I appreciate all the hard work you do! Just thought I should let you know.$1#$e#I love you, dear!$h
Good_8: Hey handsome. Don't be gone for too long.$l^Hey doll. Don't be gone for too long.$l
Good_9: I'll still love you when you're old and gray.
Neutral_0: Don't forget to stay hydrated while you work!#$e#Take plenty of breaks as well.
Neutral_1: Hmmm, I wonder what I'll do today.#$e#Is there anything on you agenda today?
Neutral_2: Are you on a break?#$b#That's good, you need to mind your health and balance rest with work.
Neutral_3: I wouldn't call married life boring, but... It feels like it's been one-sided lately.$s
Neutral_4: I'm still trying to learn how to cook properly, so I can make some nice meals for you.#$e#So far it isn't going to well...
Neutral_5: I feel a little worn out all of a sudden. I should probably go lie down.
Neutral_6: I wonder what the townsfolk are up to today?
Neutral_7: I don't feel like doing anything today. But that's me everyday...#$e#I just feel emotionally exhausted. That's all.
Neutral_8: Please don't forget to tidy around the house now and then!
Neutral_9: I wonder how long will the two of us live our lives together...
Bad_0: We are still in love... right?$s
Bad_2: Are you not happy with what we have?$8#$e#...$s
Bad_4: I hope you're not having any second thoughts about... well, us.$s
Bad_7: If there's something wrong, you need to communicate with me, @.$s#$e#*sigh*... $s
Bad_8: Sorry, but I'm not in the mood.$s
Bad_9: Maybe I should've married Emily instead... $s
spring_1: My new year's resolution is to learn something new!
spring_8: Spring was always a nice season.
spring_23: I won't be dancing tomorrow, but I wouldn't mind if you danced with someone else.
summer_1: The heat of summer is upon us!#$b#Drink plenty of water and don't overwork yourself.
summer_8: If you like, we can have a nice beach date together.#$b#I think you'd enjoy a refreshing dip in the ocean to cool off!$1
summer_15: Don't worry so much about me in this heat! You're the one who's doing all the hard work.#$b#Worry about yourself more.$0
fall_1: Ahh, I love the fall! The weather is perfect for a nice stroll in the forest.$h
fall_8: Are you prepared for the winter, darling?
fall_15: Have you decided on what items to bring for the grange display tomorrow?#$e#I hope you'll kick Pierre's butt this year!$h
fall_26: I can't wait to for the festival! I love everything about it! Especially when I get to stuff my face with food...$h
winter_1: *yawn* I start feeling drowsy whenever the snowy season arrives..$u
winter_7: Will you be participating in the fishing contest tomorrow?#$e#Best of luck of you do, honey!
winter_28: Thank you for the happiness you've brought me all year, @.$l#$e#I hope to always remain by your side.$l#$b#Here! to celebrate the new year. [348]
patio_Shiko: The weather is nice today! Get out there and do your best today, my darling!$1
spouseRoom_Shiko: Have a lovely day, @. I'm just tidying up a little here.
funLeave_Shiko: I think I'll walk down to the beach today. It's always nice to see the ocean again.
funReturn_Shiko: I had a nice time at the beach by myself. I watched the waves come and go, just like old times.
